titles: Nazianzeni querela et votum justum, The fundamentals of the hierarchy examin'd and disprov'd wherein the choicest arguments and defences of ... A.M. ... the author of An enquiry into the new opinions (chiefly) propagated by the Presbyterians in Scotland, the author of The fundamental charter of presbytry, examin'd & disprov'd, and ... the plea they bring from Ignatius's epistles more narrowly discuss'd.../ by William Jameson.
author: Jameson, William, fl. 1689-1720.
publisher: Printed by Robert Sanders for the author,
notes: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
keywords: Monro, Alexander, d. 1715? --  Enquiry into the new opinions (chiefly) propagated by the Presbyterians of Scotland.
Sage, John, 1652-1711. --  Fundamental charter of presbytery.
Ignatius, --  Saint, Bishop of Antioch, d. ca. 110. --  Epistolae.
